name: Shape Escape (legav)
description:
Objective: Collect as many coins as possible to increase your score before the ground rises all the way up. Every 10 coins collected will lower the ground, but as time goes one, the ground will rise at a faster rate. Change forms in order to reach the coins.

Controls:

Basic movement: WASD or Arrow Keys

Jump: Space bar

Balloon form: Press Up or 2

Ground form: Press Down or 1
